short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Delays & Cancellation Rates on Google Flights results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever had a flight get delayed? Or worse yet, cancelled?

See how reliable airlines are when you shop for flights on Google.  

When you visit https://flights.google.com/ or https://www.google.com/flights, this extension will show you 
how often an airline causes you delays & even cancelled flights.  You'll see these numbers on the screen next to an airline, color coded to tell you if it's more or less reliable than its competitors.  

This way you can ask yourself: Is the price difference worth it if you face a lower chance of actually getting to where you want to go?
